content: I've noticed a few FHIR profiles/valuesets using LOINC. My understand is similar to this article http://www.woodcote-consulting.com/tag/loinc/ and LOINC is rarely used. We would use SNOMED instead?
it's a bit bizarre yo say that you wouldn't use LOINC because it doesn't appear in drug dictionaries....
note that the rest of the world prefers LOINC....
Do we have any cross maps? I'm looking at Argonaut vital signs and looking at converting them for UK
I don't know of any cross maps other than that LOINC and IHTSDO are working on a general cross map

also note that there's some confusion about the vital signs - we are not mandating to use LOINC for observations; we are just fixing some particular codes for that particular use; we expect that the vital signs observations will have other more specific codes as well (whether in LOINC, MDC or SNOMED or whatever)
ICD9/10 is for secondary use, not clinical use (but I know that hasn't stopped anyone)
